parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The application information for the simulation application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the robot simulation application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: sources
nested_items.description: The sources of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The s3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: s3Key
nested_items.description: The s3 object key.

nested_items.name: etag
nested_items.description: A hash of the object specified by s3Bucket and s3Key.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The taget processor architecture for the application.

nested_items.name: simulationSoftwareSuite
nested_items.description: The simulation software suite used by the simulation application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation software suite. SimulationRuntime is the only supported value.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the simulation software suite. Not applicable for SimulationRuntime.

nested_items.name: robotSoftwareSuite
nested_items.description: Information about the robot software suite.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the robot software suite. General is the only supported value.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the robot software suite. Not applicable for General software suite.

nested_items.name: renderingEngine
nested_items.description: The rendering engine for the simulation application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the rendering engine.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the rendering engine.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The revision id of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the simulation application was last updated.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: environment
nested_items.description: The object that contains the Docker image URI used to create the simulation application.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: The Docker image URI for either your robot or simulation applications.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: A SHA256 identifier for the Docker image that you use for your simulation application.
